price: 51.Yalli woh keenik kah abam, külli nafsi addunyal maqaanek abcm hinnay umaanek abeemil kaa galtankeh iyyaanama, diggah Yalli cisab sissiki.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
